    Scribbles 3D Games Mixed Media Music Blog

This is a collection of my 3D works.
I hope you enjoy looking at them.

3D Scribbles

Some concepts for these images were sourced from the web. Some are fan art.

(Click or Tap to see an enlarged view)

3D Animations

Similar to above, inspiration for some of the animations below were sourced from the web. Some consistute fan art. All animations are traditionally hand-keyed.

Table Slap

This was an early assignment to animate a hand giving a table a good whack.

Chernobyl Cinematic

This was an environment I created for a final assignment. The goal was to create a cinematic based on some storyboards we had created earlier. This scene represents an abandoned place in Chernobyl, which may be haunted by something otherworldly.

360 Flip

This animation was done as a love letter to growing up skateboarding. The fisheye effect was captured by reflecting the entire scene against a spherical object pressed right up against the virtual camera lens.

Droid Boot Animation

This was one of my first Moto Droid 1 "hacks". After learning how to root my phone I was compelled to replace as much of the default interface & animations as possible. This was one asset I created which replaced the start-up boot animation.

Future Junk Ship Turntable

For this assignment we were tasked with creating a space ship. I liked the idea of a pieced-together ship, so I made the main hull out of converted cruise-liner. The escape pods are converted Volkswagen Buses.

Rabid Rabbit Turntable

Another assignment piece. We were provided with a few source images as concepts and had to recreate them in 3D.

UDK Beach Environment

The first environment from my Peril on Monster Island 2 1/3 game.

UDK Forest Environment

The second environment from my Peril on Monster Island 2 1/3 game.
